lead_paragraph: Tough guys Marvin and Eastwood in a big budget musical set in a old west boom town. The two miners share the same gold mine, Mormon wife and classic score by Lerner and Lowe.
snippet: Tough guys Marvin and Eastwood in a big budget musical set in a old west boom town. The two miners share the same gold mine, Mormon wife and classic score by Lerner and Lowe.
